string.value: Cody's been busy preparing for the Thanksgiving festivities. He apparently has a special request to ask of you in celebration of Thanksgiving. See what it could be!

Cody's been busy collecting #bBlue Turkey Eggs#k in celebration of Thanksgiving! Hunt the #bTurkey Monsters#k that have been appearing around the #rTowns and Mini-Dungeons of Henesys, Kerning City, Perion, Ellinia, and Orbis#k and collect as many #bBlue Turkey Eggs#k as possible for Cody!
Cody says he is truly grateful for your help and is asking you to come back and see him again in 30 minutes. Seems like he's got another favor to request.

Finally! My favorite day of the year is encroaching upon us! That's right. It's almost Thanksgiving! I get to eat all sorts of awesome food on thanksgiving. I can't wait. But there's so much to prepare for the festivities, I'm going to need someone to give me a hand with all the preparations. If you're willing to help, I'll give you either a #bPet Turkey or Some Delicious Thanksgiving Food#k in return. What do you say?

Good choice! Have you heard about the #bTurkeys#k that have recently been appearing around the #kTowns and Mini-Dungeons#k? Well, what I need are some #bBlue Turkey Eggs#k from those #bTurkeys#k. Don't need too many, just #b20#k, that's all.
You should know that #bPet Turkeys#k are only available around Thanksgiving, so don't miss this special opportunity! If you change your mind, come back and see me.

Where are the #b20 Blue Turkey Eggs#k I'd asked you for? Go to any #rarea surrounding Henesys, Kerning City, Perion, Ellinia or Orbis, or any Mini-Dungeon#k to find the #bTurkeys#k. Press the #eW#n key to see the World Map if you need help locating the Mini-Dungeons. Put your cursor on the map to see the areas marked #bMini-Dungeon#k. Try to find the dungeon that matches your level.
